Photographic Associate.responsibilities: Managed photographic equipment and assisted in capturing images. Responsible for post-processing and digital editing.

Pharmaceutical Logistics Specialist.responsibilities: Orchestrated daily delivery routes and managed pharmaceutical stock replenishments. Ensured healthcare-compliant storage and documentation.

Tour Coordinator.responsibilities: Crafted bespoke tour itineraries and coordinated with local agents. Managed customer relations and real-time crises like missed flights.

HVAC and Environmental Systems Specialis.responsibilities: Installed and maintained diverse mechanical systems. Conducted preventive maintenance checks and advised customers.
